body_html: I believe so: ./configure will call python_config.sh (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/configure#L25) which gets the numpy headers from https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/util/python/python_config.sh#L64

body: I believe so:  ./configure will call python_config.sh (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/configure#L25) which gets the numpy headers from https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/util/python/python_config.sh#L64
